txt.en: 'So Tukûrga will no longer be a terror to these lands.\n\n'Take this as a sign of my thanks, [placeholder].'
A bounty notice in Ub Nishir has asked for someone to defeat the kergrim Tukûrga in Tûkurdul to the north-west, near Ashâgir.

The bounty notice reads:

'Tukûrga is a vicious and dangerous kergrim who can be found in Tûkurdul to the north-west of here. This monster must be stopped.

'Neshurga in Ub Nishir will reward you if you slay Tukûrga.'
Return to Neshurga in Ub Nishir north of Maurûsh and inform him that you have completed the bounty and defeated Tukûrga.
A bounty notice asks you to defeat a vicious kergrim known as Tukûrga in Tûkurdul, to the north-west near Ashâgir.
Return to Neshurga and inform him of Tukûrga's defeat
